0.8.name: wordpress/garees-flickr-feed
0.8.description:
Garee's Flickr Feed is a highly customizable Wordpress-plugin that integrates pictures from flickr on your blog. The output is generated from template-files or your own templates, which you can write with Mustache.

For more information check out the official plugin-site

Main-advantages:

  • Flickr-requests are cached
  • CSS only included if shortcode found on page
  • highly customizable with Mustache-templates

Just insert the shortcode anywhere on your blog: [flickr_feed]

Use shortcode-options to further customize which content and how they should be displayed. Check out the examples on the live-demo
